title: T-shirt Arrival Day
content:
Many thanks to Sarah Bush for sending my 2 Uppercase T-shirts!

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: i myself was pleasantly surprised at how quickly i received my membership materials. those [punchcut](http://web.archive.org/wiki/punchcut) guys & gals are really getting their stuff together!

Yes Paul, Sarah was both pleasant and efficient.
